tool_description: Access the official Slovakian Government Company register via this API, ideal for KYB purposes
name: Slovakia Company Data
title: Slovakia Company Data

api_list.name: GetAddressfromCompanyLinkedID
api_list.description: Get the company address using the linked ID found in previous calls.

api_list.name: SearchbyCompanyName
api_list.description: Search the Slovak company register using the company name. Using % as a wildcard.

api_list.name: SearchbycompanyId
api_list.description: Seach the slovak business register using the company ID.

api_list.name: SearchpersonbyownerId
api_list.description: Search by a person (business owner) from the Slovak business register using the linked ID.
